verses.content: Aw Laltak, ka Pathien, chawimawi ka ti cheh a, I hming hi kumkhawtluongin inpâk ka tih.
Ni tin inpâk ka ti cheh a, I hming hi kumkhawtluongin inpâk ka tih.
LALPA chu a ropui a, nasataka inpâk ding a nih, A ropuizie chu suisuok ruol a ni nawh.
Suon khatin suon dang kâwlah i thilthawhai chu inpâk sâwng pei an ta, I thilthaw ropuitakhai chu inhriettir an tih.
Nangma chawimawina mawizie ropuitak le, I thilmak thawhai chu ngaituong ka tih.
Mihaiin i thilthaw râpthlâktak hrâtzie chu hril an ta, Kei khawma i ropuizie inhriettir bawk ka tih.
I ṭhatna ropuitak an hriet zing chu hril an ta, I felna thu hi hlimtakin hlain sak an tih.
LALPA chu mi lunginsiet thei, lainatnaa sip, Lunginuoi, ngilneina nasatak nei a nih.
LALPA chu iengkim chunga khawm a ṭha a nih; A lainatnahai chu a thil siem po po chungah a um a.
Aw LALPA, i thil siem po po chun i kuomah lâwmthu hril an tih; Mi inthienghai khawma inpâk an ti che.
I ram ropuizie thu hrilin, I thilthawtheina thu chu thusimah la hmang an tih.
Mihriem nauhai kuoma a thilthaw ropuitakhai le, A ram mawina ropuizie inhriettir dingin.
I ram chu chatuon ram ding a na, I thuneina chu suon um sûng po poin um zing a tih.
LALPA chun a tluhai po po chu a chel zing hlak a, Kûn ngawi ngawia um po pohai chu a keitho hlak.
I thil siem po po mithai chun an nghâk hlak che a nih; Nangin a hun takah an bu i pêk hlak.
I kut i phar a, Thilhring po po châkna chu i sukbopêk hlak.
LALPA chu a um dân po poah a felin, A thilthaw po poah mi lunginsiettheitak a ni hlak.
LALPA chun ama kotuhai po po chu a hnai hlak a, Titakzeta ama kotu po pohai chu.
Ama ṭituhai dit chu inhlawtlingtir a ta, An khêkri chu hrieng a ta, anni sandam a tih.
LALPA chun ama hmangaituhai po po chu a vawng ṭha hlak, Mi rilo ruok chu sukbohmang vawng a tih.
Ka bau hin LALPA inpâkna thu hril a ta; Chun, tisa po po chun a hming inthieng chu kumkhaw- tluongin inpâk raw se.
